comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called A History of Georgia, and we'd love to have your photo added to the group.

comment.author: 87317483@N06
comment._content: Growing up in Atlanta, when we misbehaved our parents would threaten us that if we didn't straighten up we would "end up at the end of Boulevard" which is depicted above.
